path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 508px; height: 1px; padding-top: 145px; margin-left: 23px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div: Agent Instruction: "You are a coding agent", "get necessary context"
Workflow Guidelines: "Split complex problem", "Keep track of all steps"
Tool Use Instruction: "When using a tool, follow JSON schema", "run multiple tools in parallel except terminal tool (wait for result of first command, then second and so on)"
Communication Style: "Show file in certain way, maybe with line number"

span.font: Custom Instruction: Contains file attachments of '

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 230, 204), rgb(54, 33, 10)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(215, 155, 0), rgb(153, 101, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 75px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.div: Attachements: list of atachment files metadata - {id:<file-name>, filePath, fileContent }
User Request: <problem statement in the chat input box>

div.font: When '*.prompt.md' is added in chat box -> This prompt.md file is added to the attachments list and chat box is updated to 'Follow instructions in [*.prompt.md](file:///**/*.prompt.md). <problem statement>'
